title: LMS Utilization Strategies to Enhance Online Learning Engagement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and foundational workplace language skills
context.additional_context: A simulation/VR-based language education program for in-company managers/leaders in a smartphone-centric, limited technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose their participation levels (low/medium/high) in three tiers by analyzing LMS activity logs.
Learners engage in peer interaction activities at least three times per week in VR simulation environments.
Learners demonstrate learning comprehension by achieving an 80% or higher accuracy rate in LMS-based formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
